review: Fire TV Stick is great!  Had a bit of a hard time getting it connected, no one knew it is your WIRELESS password to get connected.  Other than that issue, it is GREAT!
author: artquiltgirl

review: Amazing! I will recommend this product to everyone I know!
author: Kandice E.

review: This connects easily to your TV and wireless, and works great.  I highly recommend this item!
author: Heffner "Heffner596"

review: Love it. Wish I would have bought it years ago. Signed up for the trial of Prime and bought Netflix. Prime is a little harder to navigate than Netflix but it has some things Netflix doesn't so I will probably keep both.
author: chippy's mom
